评论详情: I bought this for my 11 years old birthday pool party (For crazy pictures), but all the girls (And the adults) loved them! Great material, beautiful colors!

The first (prominent) photo shows one of the pairs as red "dripping" hearts. There is another photo further down in the description and the red pair is regular, not "dripping. " So there are two pairs of the same regular heart shape, one is pink and red. The missing style is the one I wanted...

These glasses are an adorable set, I got them to hand out to my group for an anime convention. It was a fun little extra. The glasses are very vibrant and made a great photo prop. The colors are bright and they work as actual sunglasses outside. They are also pretty sturdy and don't break if dropped or thrown. 10/10 great set

These glasses are so bright and fun, and each pair comes individually wrapped! I love that I can use these in class and still see students faces, so they feel cool for getting to wear them, and I can still feel like I'm teaching humans! They all are fighting over the flames ones! I probably should buy a set of just those!

评论概述: Nice fashion glasses for fun outfit matching
评论详情: My daughter has a blast with these fashion glasses. They don't offer sun protection, they are just for being stylish. Lots of fun shapes and colors to match any outfit. Large enough for adults or big kids.
These glasses are very cute HOWEVER, the hot pink is not hot pink. It is RED. Go with the lighter pink if you want pink

My toddler has since these arrived, been stealing a pair each day to match with his outfit of the day. I cannot stress how much swag my 3 year old has suddenly decided to have all on his own with these sunglasses and he loves every single pair! So do i especially the green ones. they definitely give old Carmen SanDiego vibes!
